document_data.mainbody:
etrine was an elven girl that lived in the city of Baldurs Gate with her uncle for a time during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Although the exact circumstances were unknown, Petrines parents were no longer in her life and she lived with her uncle Bheren, who she found to be quite mean.
Petrine had a cat named Angel that she believed watched over and protected her from harm.
In the , Petrine ran away from her uncles home but lost Angel in the process. The cat had returned to their previous home in the Upper City to retrieve its favorite trinket, an angel skin ring.
